PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>

DELETE
	{	?dataset dcterms:publisher ?publ }
INSERT
	{ 	?dataset dcat:contactPoint <http://data.gov.be/org/meteo/meteo/contact> .
		?dataset dcterms:publisher <http://data.gov.be/org/meteo/meteo> }
WHERE
	{ 	?dataset a dcat:Dataset  .
		?dataset dcterms:publisher ?publ }
